text:
Lal Khan (born Tanveer Gondal; June 1956 – 21 February 2020) was a Pakistani political activist and Marxist political theorist.
He was a physician by profession but ceased practicing medicine. He was the leader of the Pakistani Marxist organisation "The Struggle", and editor of its newspaper. He also wrote regular articles for [http://dailytimes.com.pk/search/test/%C2%A0/483/Lal%20Khan Daily Times] and the [http://www.dunya.com.pk/index.php/columnist/dr-lal-khan/53 Dunya].
He died on 21 February 2020 of cancer at the age of 63.
